data.route_analysis: Various transportation options available including flights, trains, and buses with associated costs and travel times.
data.seasonal_patterns: Peak travel months are June to August, with a decline in December and February.
data.climate: Hot summers with average temperatures ranging from 25-35°C, mild winters with temperatures around 5-15°C.
data.culture: Rich in traditions, vibrant festivals celebrated, local cuisine is diverse and unique to the region.
